row.process: :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RM.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JSON_BODY_BEGINNING :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RM.PRV.INCLUDE.GET_DYNAMIC_FULL_NAME :SET &REQUEST_BODY# = STR_CAT(&REQUEST_BODY#, """dynamic"": {") : SWITCH &UC4RB_DYNAMIC_PROP_VALUE_TYPE# : CASE "Static" : SET &REQUEST_BODY# = STR_CAT(&REQUEST_BODY#, """&UC4RB_DYNAMIC_FULL_NAME#"": ""&UC4RB_DYNAMIC_PROP_VALUE#""") : CASE "Expression" : SET &REQUEST_BODY# = STR_CAT(&REQUEST_BODY#, """&UC4RB_DYNAMIC_FULL_NAME#"": {""expression"": ""&UC4RB_DYNAMIC_PROP_VALUE#""}") : CASE "Prompt" : SET &REQUEST_BODY# = STR_CAT(&REQUEST_BODY#, """&UC4RB_DYNAMIC_FULL_NAME#"": ""&UC4RB_DYNAMIC_PROP_VALUE#""") : ENDSWITCH :SET &REQUEST_BODY# = STR_CAT(&REQUEST_BODY#, "}") :PRINT &REQUEST_BODY# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_RM.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JSON_BODY_ENDING :PSET &UC4RB_DYNAMIC_PROPERTY_DATA# = &REQUEST_BODY#
